transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello hmm
Executive: Haan Rakhi bol sir aap bataiye kya karna hai final kyunki sir dekho refund ka toh nahi hai policy.
Customer: Kaun bola refund ka possible nahi hai aap log kya bolte hai koi tension koi aap logo ka koi marzi hai jo suniye mera baat suniye khol
Customer: Aadmi log aate hai ullu bana ke khol dete hai woh bolta hai aisa nahi hota hai waisa hota hai aisa karke phir aap bol rahe hai refund nahi aata hai kya bolu main aapko.
Executive: Unka phone aaya tha na aapke paas Nasim ka kya bol rahe the aap.
Customer: Are phone aaya hoga abhi jo bhi aaya kuch woh sab chodiye mam woh bol ke bol ke gaya je tum jab chaho band kar sakte ho paisa tumhara refund aayega aap log bolte ho refund nahi aayega.
Executive: Hmm toh sir refund toh wahi hai na dekho sir refund kis case mein hota hai agar hum aapko business na de paaye yeh toh aapka problem hai.
Customer: Mera galti nahi hai aap logo ka galti hai aap log aap log ka staff ka galti hai na business abhi 15 din ho gaye aap bol rahe grow hi nahi hua hai itna design diya tha ek bhi customer nahi aaya ek bhi order nahi mil raha hai aap bol rahe.
Executive: Sir sabko aayega na customer aap sirf south south location ke peeche pade ho abhi customer aayega dekho sir thoda.
Customer: Dekhiye woh Nasim mere paas mein aayega mam theek hai woh aayega woh kya karega nahi toh usse paisa hum udhar lena jaante hai theek hai usse hum paisa lena jaante hai.
Executive: Sir dekho main samajh rahi hu sir aapki baat.
Customer: Theek hai mam main mera baat suniye woh mere ko aisa ullu bana ke gaya na main usse paisa udhar tight karna jaanti hu paisa mera mera paisa hai na main utha uthane ke liye mera hai yaar theek hai.
Executive: Sir ek baat batao hyper hone se kya hoga.
Customer: Kuch nahi hoga mere ko mera ko mere ko dusri baat bol ke dusri baat bol ke account khol ke gaya aap bol rahe woh refund nahi milega aapka company ka apna company ka toh bahut bada bahut naam hai bolo.
Executive: Oh haan haan.
Customer: Naam hai naam kyun badnaam kar rahe hai mam naam kyun badnaam kar rahe hai mam.
Executive: Aap meri ek baat suno ek kaam karo.
Customer: Aap aise aap mera baat suniye aap aise bol rahe hai na agli agli zindagi mein main kabhi bhi IndiaMART mein account nahi kholunga abhi aisa bolega toh aap refund mera mera khud ka mera khud ka Chennai mein main online dukaan ka business karne wali hu mam theek hai lekin aap log aisa karoge na toh IndiaMART chhod ke aur bhi dusra company hai.
Executive: Sir sales person aapko kya bol ke gaya hume head office wale ko kaise pata woh aapko jo bhi bol ke gaya hai.
Customer: Woh aapke gaya hai mam.
Executive: Woh woh aapse aapko aapko.
Customer: Theek hai mam usse main paisa paisa lena jaanti hu mam main woh kar lunga theek hai nahi toh main thane mein jaake suniye mera baat suniye.
Executive: Main aapko solution de sakti hu agar aapko achha lage toh bataiye theek hai.
Customer: Main business nahi karna chahti hu aapke company se clearly bolta raha hu main mere ko mere ko ulta bol ke account khola abhi bol rahe ho refund nahi milega main paisa usi se udhar uthana jaanti hu main thane mein jaake chest thok dunga kya karunga phir.
Executive: Nahi nahi aise kuch mat kijiye aap mere ko aapko ek solution de do agar aapko achha lage toh.
Customer: Woh solution nahi hai mam mera paisa main uthana jaanti hu mam main thane mein jaake complaint kar dunga main koi tension nahi hai Nasim mein jaake mere company main kya kar sakta hu main mera baat boliye itna paisa main diya kya kaay ke liye diya.
Customer: Itna paisa main kaay ke liye diya mam boliye mere ko jhoot baat bol ke account kyun khola gaya.
Executive: Haan woh baat aapki sahi hai sir aapki sahi hai.
Customer: Main main pehle bhi bol chuka hu mera bahut paisa udhar bahut paisa atak gaya hai mera baar baar maine Nasim bhai ko bola hai main mera paisa udhar bahut atak raha hai bahut atak raha hai mam aap log bol rahe hai refund nahi milega kaun bolega main case kar dunga main kuch nahi karunga main direct case kar dunga mam.
Customer: Refund nahi milega toh mera paisa refund nahi milega jaanti hu main.
Executive: Sir dekhiye dekhiye aise hyper hone se kuch nahi hoga hum mujhse discuss kar lijiye aap mujhse jo ban payega main karungi theek hai aap mere ko yeh batao business nahi karna IndiaMART se aapko ab.
Customer: Nahi karna hai mam.
Executive: Nahi karna hai aap jaise maine aapko bataya tha ki main aapki saari south ki location ko north preferred mark kara deti hu jisse kya hoga aapko south ki location mein visibility nahi rahegi woh bhi nahi karwana hai sir.
Customer: Mam aap kya bola pehle bol rahe hai net mein dikhega woh usko pata chal gaya na woh kahin se bhi khoj lega mam.
Executive: Haan toh dekho yeh cheez hoga ki aap agar waha ka customer nahi uthaoge sir toh waha pe itni aasaani se aapka company dikhega dikhega but neeche dikhega upar nahi dikhega ab aap bataiye is cheez mein okay ho.
Customer: Nahi mera baat mam samajh nahi pa rahe aap bol rahe google mein search karoge toh kahin bhi kisi ki kone mein chale jao aapko mil jayega mam kisi bhi kone mein chale jao.
Executive: Ji ji haan.
Customer: Theek hai mam mere ko aisa bol ke gaya je aapka pura udhar south mein kuch nahi dikhega aisa bol ke gaya.
Customer: Yahi mere ko sabse bahut dikkat aa gaya mam.
Executive: Chalo main samajh rahi hu matlab aapko koi solution nahi chahiye yeh wala aapko nahi chahiye.
Customer: Nahi chahiye.
Executive: Clear hai hai na chalo main apne sir call ek senior ko apne de rahi hu aap ek baar unse baat kar lo refund ke regarding phir hum dekhte hai aapke liye kya ho pata hai hyper mat hoiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai call par main aapko call de rahi hu apne manager ko.
Customer: Theek.
(silence)
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir boliye mam
Customer: Sir abhi humare ko yahi solution mil paya hai upar se ki hum aapke product ko kis tarah se aur badha sake aur grow karwa sake aur north preferred location karwa sake.
Customer: Mere ko mere ko IndiaMART se koi business nahi karna hai mere ko pehle woh galat baat bol ke account khulwaya ek saal ke liye paisa le liya abhi mera dikkat aa raha hai main bol raha hu main account close karna chahti hu mera paisa refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir aise nahi hota hai na sir samadhan nikalna chahta hai kya humare paas business na ho tab koi extreme case hota hai yeh toh koi case hi nahi hai sir.
Customer: Mere ko pehle mere ko pehle mera problem maine aap logo ko bata diya mam theek hai problem aap logo ko bata diya pehle hi bata diya mam theek hai pehle hi aap logo ko bata diya woh bhi aise kar raha hai toh aap bhi kya bol sakte ho boliye paisa nahi dega toh main direct thane mein jaake complaint kar dunga mere ko mere ko aisa aisa bol ke gaya aisa aisa account karke gaya main kya karu main refund chahiye mam theek hai jo bhi hai ek mahine ka banta hai ek mahine ka kaat ke mere ko refund de do koi tension nahi do mahine ka kaat ke mere ko refund de do koi tension nahi.
Executive: Sir baat yeh hoti hai na hum aapke liye baithe hai yaha pe account manager dedicated hai aap ek do customer se on call baat toh kariye sir itna bhi bura nahi rahega aapka yeh jo feedback hai jo aapka abhi mindset bana hua hai na yeh change ho jayega.
Customer: Mam theek hai lekin aapka baat samajh sakte ho mere ko pehle kyun bola gaya yeh baat mere ko achha nahi laga pehle hi pehle hi aap logo ne aisa aadmi mere ko aaya aisa karke gaya na mere ko mere ko bolne ka mood nahi hai abhi mam main chhod dijiye aap refund ka kuch bare mein kuch ho sakta hai kya boliye.
Executive: Sir unhone jo kiya hai jo kaha hai woh unka call hai lekin hum jo aapko keh rahe hai ki hum aapko proper service dene ke liye baithe hai toh aap idhar se thoda sa samajhiye sir is cheez ko bhi.
Customer: Mere ko karna hi nahi hai aap logo se business mam mere ko karna hi nahi pehle bol raha hu mere ko karna hi nahi pehle hi pehle jhoot baat bol ke toh agla samne jaake kya karunga main mere ko karna hi nahi mam pehle baar baar mere mein aapko bol raha hu mere ko karna hi nahi hai abhi refund ka bare mein sochiye mam ek mahina do mahina kaat ke mere ko refund dijiye.
Customer: Pehle hi galat baat bol ke account khulwaya.
Executive: Toh unki taraf se main maafi mangti hu sir.
Customer: Woh sab chodiye mam kya ho sakta hai woh kariye refund ke bare mein sochiye.
Executive: Sir aap toh business ke liye aaye hai na sir refund ke liye toh aap nahi bol rahe hai business ke liye aaye hai na sir.
Customer: Mam aapse request kar raha hu mam kuch ho sakta hai toh boliye mera mindset abhi utna nahi hai theek hai mera karigar log baithe hue hai usse bhi baat karna hai mere ko boliye.
Executive: Sir main keh rahi hu ki agar hum service ko better kar sakte hai toh usme toh koi dikkat nahi hai na sir.
Customer: Mam aapko baar baar mere ko ek baat bolne ka refund ka bare mein kuch boliye mam kuch ho sakta hai kya boliye.
Executive: Sir hum service better kar sakte hai sir.
Customer: Usse alawa aur kuch nahi kar sakte na aap.
Executive: Sir uske alawa aap bhi toh yahi chah rahe honge na ki service mein improvement aa jaye.
Customer: Mere ko service karna hi nahi hai mam.
Executive: Sir phir main aapke baat karti hu apne senior se.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line.
Executive: Apni je byakti shonge kotha bolchen tini apnar call ti holde rekhechen daya kore line e thakun.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line.
Executive: Apni je byaktir shonge kotha bolchen tini apnar call ti holde rekhechen daya kore line e thakun.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai usne aapki call ko hold pe rak
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Alleges misrepresentation during account opening.

- Claims business not growing, no customers received.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to mark south locations as non-preferred.

- Executive transferred the call to a senior manager.

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive transferred call to manager.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business growth, misrepresentation, complaint
